Package net.minecraftforge.client.textures

Class ForgeTextureMetadata

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.client.textures.ForgeTextureMetadata
public final class ForgeTextureMetadata extends Object
The "forge" section of texture metadata files (.mcmeta). Currently used only to specify custom TextureAtlasSprite loaders.
See Also:
